pages.title: Prismatic Upgrade
pages.text: You can upgrade various tools to their prismatic forms using a smithing template.$(br2)You can find this template in loot chests everywhere, if you're lucky.

pages.title: Prismatic Pickaxe
pages.text: A pickaxe made with prismatic metal. Can be used to break tough glass.

pages.text: An axe made with prismatic metal.
